# MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionType.audible

**Case**

Indicates an audible language option is used.

## Declaration

```swift
case audible
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **MPNowPlayingInfoLanguageOptionType.legible**: Indicates a written language option is used.
